channel.title: Posts on janreggie's sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on janreggie's sandbox

item.title: I completed the Haskell MOOC
item.description: The Haskell MOOC   is an online course on Functional Programming using Haskell. It is a great way to introduce experienced programmers into functional programming, and I myself have been introduced to the paradigm properly through this course.

item.title: SQL Murder Mystery
item.description: The SQL Murder Mystery   is quite an interesting game wherein users are invited to solve a murder mystery. This is a great way for me to hone my SQL skills after completing learning SQL through Select Star SQL   . In this post I will discuss my solution for finding out who did the murder, and a small activity afterwards.
